Senate Bill 1051

Introduced ( html | pdf )

SB 1051 By Senator BOQUIST; Senators FERRIOLI, GIROD, KRUSE, MORSE, WHITSETT (Presession filed.) -- Relating to state finance; prescribing an effective date.
02/01 (S) Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
02/01 (S) Referred to Finance and Revenue, then Ways and Means.
02/25 (S) In committee upon adjournment.
